stepAnswer: an assessment tool used by mental health professionals to analyze an individual’s cognitive, emotional, and behavioral functioning
stepTitle: What is the mental status exam (MSE)?
choices: an assessment tool used by mental health professionals to analyze an individual’s cognitive, emotional, and behavioral functioning
